description: Numbers n such that 12 repeated n times followed by 1 is a palindromic prime.
example: 12121212121 is prime so 5 appears in the sequence.
crossrefs: Corresponding primes are given in A092696. Corresponding decimal digit lengths are given in A062209. a(k) = (A062209(k-1)-1)/2.
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 22 2000
extensions: More terms from _Rick L. Shepherd_, Mar 04 2004
